name: Calendar
description: Interactive date grid for selecting dates with month/year navigation and locale support

accessibility.screenReader: Announces as an application with 'Calendar' label. Month/year heading uses aria-live for navigation changes. Day cells use role=gridcell with aria-selected state. Disabled dates announce as disabled.
knownLimitations: Date range selection not yet implemented

recommendedUsage: Use within DatePicker for date selection or standalone for displaying a calendar view. Configure locale, min/max bounds, and disabled dates as needed.
antiPatterns: Do not use for date range selection until range support is added. Avoid using for read-only date display where a simpler format would suffice.
